original_text:
The Lord swore to David a sure oath
    from which he will not turn back:
“One of the sons of your body
    I will set on your throne.
korean_text: 여호와께서 다윗에게 성실히 맹세하셨으니 변하지 아니하실지라 이르시기를 네 몸의 소생을 네 왕위에 둘지라

sentences.original_text: The Lord swore to David a sure oath
from which he will not turn back
One of the sons of your body
I will set on your throne.
